description:
The Straw Hats put Jimbei`s plan into action and approach Bege with the possibility of an alliance. But before they are granted an audience, they must make themselves presentable! At the same time, Nami learns about the terror of Big Mom from Lola`s twin sister!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Secret Meeting! Luffy vs. the Fire Tank Pirates!
Ein geheimes Treffen! – Ruffy gegen die Fire-Tank-Piratenbande!
Mikkai! Luffy tai Fire Tank Kaizokudan
Réunion secrète ! Luffy vs. l`équipage des Fire Tank
Тайная встреча! Луффи против Пиратов Огненного Танка!
اجتماع سرّيّ! لوفي ضدّ قراصنة دبّابة النّار!
密会! ルフィVS[たい]ファイアタンク海賊団
